arts.ttl: Former Shamrock Rovers prospect makes Ligue 1 debut against Lyon
arts.sum: Former Shamrock Rovers forward Ike Orazi made his Ligue 1 bow on Sunday for Stade Reims, as the French outfit made a little bit of Irish footballing history. “We would like to wish Ike all the best with his move to France as he joins Ligue 1 side Stade de Reims,” it read.

arts.ttl: Lyon pleases new coach Fonseca with fine attacking display in 4-0 win over Reims
arts.sum: Coach Paulo Fonseca pledged to bring attacking soccer back to Lyon, and his players obeyed him by routing Reims 4-0 in the French league on Sunday. Later Sunday, Marseille looked to strengthen its grip on second place with a win at Angers.

arts.ttl: Reims lodge appeal against Lyon for fielding Botafogo loanee Thiago Almada in their Ligue 1 matchday squad
arts.sum: Stade de Reims have taken the decision to lodge an appeal against Ligue 1 rivals Lyon for fielding Thiago Almada (23) in their matchday squad, L’Equipe can reveal. Reims are the…

arts.ttl: Former Lyon defender Jason Denayer on Saudi Pro League: “It’s the same level as Ligue 1.”
arts.sum: A frequent topic of discussion has emerged since Saudi Arabia’s Public Investment Fund (PIF) upended world football with the purchase of four of the Saudi Pro League’s top teams. These…

arts.ttl: Reims predicted XI v Lyon: Keito Nakamura dropped, Amadou Koné and John Patrick start
arts.sum: Samba Diawara has come in as the caretaker head coach for Stade de Reims following the dismissal of summer appointment Luka Elsner. Diawara took the reigns for Reims’ Coupe de…

arts.ttl: Lyon predicted XI v Reims: Georges Mikautadze replaces Alexandre Lacazette
arts.sum: Paulo Fonseca takes the reigns at Olympique Lyonnais for the second time as the club play host to Stade de Reims. It will be the Portuguese head coach’s first home…

arts.ttl: Sunday's Ligue 1 predictions including Lyon vs. Reims
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Ligue 1 fixtures, including Lyon vs. Reims.

arts.ttl: Lyon reject bid from Galatasaray for Ainsley Maitland-Niles
arts.sum: According to a report from Foot Mercato, Lyon have rejected a bid from Galatasaray to sign Ainsley Maitland-Niles (27). The Turkish club are looking to sign a right-back before the transfer…
